name: CIFaceFeature
desc: Information about a face detected in a still or video image.

items.name: var bounds: CGRect
items.desc: A rectangle indicating the position and dimensions of the face in image coordinates.

items.name: var hasFaceAngle: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether information about face rotation is available.

items.name: var hasLeftEyePosition: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the detector found the face’s left eye.

items.name: var hasRightEyePosition: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the detector found the face’s right eye.

items.name: var hasMouthPosition: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the detector found the face’s mouth.

items.name: var leftEyePosition: CGPoint
items.desc: The coordinates of the left eye, in image coordinates.

items.name: var rightEyePosition: CGPoint
items.desc: The coordinates of the right eye, in image coordinates

items.name: var mouthPosition: CGPoint
items.desc: The coordinates of the mouth, in image coordinates

items.name: var hasSmile: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a smile is detected in the face.

items.name: var leftEyeClosed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a closed left eye is detected in the face.

items.name: var rightEyeClosed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a closed right eye is detected in the face.

items.name: var hasTrackingID: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the face object has a tracking ID.

items.name: var trackingID: Int32
items.desc: The tracking identifier of the face object.

items.name: var hasTrackingFrameCount: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates the face object has a tracking frame count.

items.name: var trackingFrameCount: Int32
items.desc: The tracking frame count of the face.
